statements: SELECT * FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'Low';
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE article_source = 'New York Times';
SELECT article_title, article_source FROM articles_cross_reference ORDER BY article_title DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_source, bias_level FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'High' ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT article_title, reference_article_id FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE reference_article_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'Low';
SELECT article_title, article_source FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY article_title DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, article_source FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'High' AND article_source LIKE '%Newspaper%' ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, reference_article_id FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'Low' OR bias_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY reference_article_id DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, article_source FROM articles_cross_reference WHERE bias_level = 'High' AND article_source LIKE '%Online%' ORDER BY article_title DESC;
SELECT id, title, source FROM article;
SELECT * FROM article WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, source FROM article WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title FROM article ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, source FROM article WHERE source = 'New York Times';
SELECT id, title, source FROM article WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM article ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title FROM article WHERE source = 'CNN';
SELECT a.title, b.bias_level FROM article a JOIN bias_level b ON a.id = b.article_id WHERE b.bias_level = 'Moderate';
SELECT source, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM article GROUP BY source HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_articles DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT article_title, bias_level FROM articles ORDER BY bias_level DESC;
SELECT source_name FROM sources WHERE source_bias='left';
SELECT article_title, source_name FROM articles INNER JOIN article_sources ON articles.article_id = article_sources.article_id INNER JOIN sources ON sources.source_id = article_sources.source_id;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_title LIKE '%COVID%' AND bias_level > 3;
SELECT article_title, source_name FROM articles, sources WHERE articles.source_id = sources.source_id;
SELECT DISTINCT article_title, source_name FROM articles, sources WHERE articles.source_id = sources.source_id;
SELECT article_title, source_name FROM articles JOIN article_sources ON articles.article_id = article_sources.article_id JOIN sources ON article_sources.source_id = sources.source_id;
SELECT article_title, source_name FROM articles, sources WHERE articles.source_id = sources.source_id AND articles.bias_level > 2;
SELECT MAX(bias_level), source_bias FROM articles, sources WHERE articles.bias_level = sources.source_bias;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 123;
SELECT article_id, source FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%example%';
SELECT source_name FROM sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT title, source_name FROM articles JOIN article_sources ON articles.article_id = article_sources.article_id JOIN sources ON article_sources.source_id = sources.source_id;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title,content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT a.title, a.source, s.source_name FROM articles a JOIN article_sources b ON a.article_id = b.article_id JOIN sources s ON b.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT * FROM article_sources JOIN bias_levels ON article_sources.bias_level = bias_levels.level_name;
SELECT a.title, COUNT(b.source_id) AS source_count FROM articles a JOIN article_sources b ON a.article_id = b.article_id GROUP BY a.title;
SELECT article_title, source_name FROM articles INNER JOIN article_sources ON articles.article_id = article_sources.article_id INNER JOIN sources ON article_sources.source_id = sources.source_id;
SELECT source_name, domain_URL FROM sources WHERE source_name = 'CNN';
SELECT article_title, bias_level FROM articles WHERE bias_level IN ('Left', 'Left-Center') ORDER BY bias_level ASC;

SELECT article_title, source_name, domain_URL FROM articles INNER JOIN article_sources ON articles.article_id = article_sources.article_id INNER JOIN sources ON article_sources.source_id = sources.source_id WHERE sources.source_name = 'Fox News';
SELECT article_title, source_name, bias_level FROM articles ORDER BY article_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT article_title, source_name FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT article_title, domain_URL FROM articles JOIN article_sources ON articles.article_id = article_sources.article_id JOIN sources ON article_sources.source_id = sources.source_id;
SELECT article_title, bias_level FROM articles WHERE bias_level='Neutral';

SELECT DISTINCT source_name FROM articles JOIN article_sources ON articles.article_id = article_sources.article_id JOIN sources ON article_sources.source_id = sources.source_id ORDER BY source_name ASC;
